resources.string: Passwords must be longer than 5 characters. \n\nUsername and Password fields must not be empty.

Sliding Tiles is a game where you must order the twentyFortyEightTiles numerically using the least number of moves to win! 

 Click New Game to select the dimensions of the game and the amount of undos you wish to play with. 

 Click Load Game to load a previously saved game. 

 Click scoreboard to view how well you stack up against other players!

Minesweeper is a game about clearing a minefield. Each twentyFortyEightTile is either a bomb or a safe twentyFortyEightTile. When a twentyFortyEightTile is clicked, it will reveal how many bombs there are adjacent to it. 

Clicking a bomb will lose the game.

 Hold a twentyFortyEightTile to mark it with a flag, so you can remember where the bombs are. 

Reaveal all non bomb twentyFortyEightTiles to win.

2048 is a game about adding like terms. 

Swipe up, down, left and right to combine twentyFortyEightTiles and amass the largest score you can get! 

Each time you swipe, a new twentyFortyEightTile appears, and a full twentyFortyEightBoard constitutes a loss. 

Each time you combine two like twentyFortyEightTiles, they merge and create a twentyFortyEightTile of with value equal to the sum of the two. 

Good Luck!
